description: A React functional component implementing an API token authentication form for Jira and Confluence services, handling validation, user input, and submission via context-based authentication methods.

methods.name: ApiTokenForm
methods.description: React component rendering a form for API token authentication for Jira and Confluence.

methods.name: validateForm
methods.description: Validates the form data, checking for required fields and proper formats.

methods.name: handleInputChange
methods.description: Handles user input changes, updates form data, and clears validation errors for the changed field.

methods.name: handleSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission, performs validation, calls authentication methods, and manages loading state and error handling.
